TopicTitle: Most up to date K.A.S. mod that is compatible with the update?

Articles.Content:
Hello, 

anyone know where to download the most up to date Kerbal Attachment System mod that is compatible with the new version of KSP?

Thanks!

Moved over to General Add-on affairs, the best place for mod-related questions.

Welcome aboard!

Well, the thread for the mod is here: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92514-0-90-Kerbal-Attachment-System-%28KAS%29-0-4-10](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92514-0-90-Kerbal-Attachment-System-%28KAS%29-0-4-10) , however, parts of it are being depreciated and rolled into [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92514-0-90-Kerbal-Attachment-System-%28KAS%29-0-4-10](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92514-0-90-Kerbal-Attachment-System-%28KAS%29-0-4-10) including KASs inventory system which is being replaced by KIS. So, you'd actually be waiting for KIS since that's what's using the inventory system and everybody is waiting for. It'll take a few days for that to get updated, so, soon.

"Parts of it." Just to clarify, KospY says in that thread winches, pipes, hooks, etc (aka "attachments") will stay in KAS and that'll be updated for 1.0 separately. KIS sounds like more like a breakout mod than a KAS 2.
